ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the mobile field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(PersonMobilePhone ) && NOT(ISNULL(PersonMobilePhone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(PersonMobilePhone )) && !REGEX(PersonMobilePhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(PersonMobilePhone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(PersonMobilePhone )) && !REGEX(PersonMobilePhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for mobile. The minimum number of digits should be 10
